meta.ip: Told of this document the concerning the people of nation Israel of time Samwil pad the teacher ran until nakasubal e Saul migpangulu them. And/Now Saul the first King. Told also of this document ke what the reason naawaan Saul of responsibility din isip King, and impasubalan e he of God ki David.

Te not yet King long ago of Israel, iyan pad in-isip of people King dan the God. But mighangyu them of God egbehayan of King egpangulu them. And/Now igkeupii of God egparuma-ruma the King and the people of pegmandu din and of kandin judging. Because the all katenged of person, rich man ma and the poor, it's necessary egpekeuyun of Law of God.

The theme of this document that pegkamatinumanen of God there egpangkus of kapanaluwan, and the pegsupak of igkeupii of God there egpangkus of karereetan. Naay-ayaran sika nalalag of God there to chapter 2:30 miggenendue, “The migtahud keddi, egtahuren my also and the miglemet keddi, eglemetan my also.”

io1: The hun‑a year(s) of kingdom of Saul
